name: UIButton.Role
desc: Constants that describe the role of the button.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: A button role for a default button style.

items.name: case primary
items.desc: A button role that responds to a primary key press.

items.name: case cancel
items.desc: A button role that responds to a cancel action.

items.name: case destructive
items.desc: A button role with a red background color.
